nodes.text: A base built on an asteroid was used as a headquarters for Maul's descendant during his conquest against Darth Krayt's New Empire.

Maul's asteroid base was created for the video game Battle of the Sith Lords. In the game, a descendent or clone of Darth Maul would team up with Darth Talon to take down Darth Krayt's New Empire for violating the Rule of Two. This location would have been their headquarters and a recurring location throughout the game.
Concept art for the base was created by artist Thomas A. Szakolczay for Red Fly Studio and was published publicly by Game Informer in 2014.
